Insert_banknotes_or_coins: Insert banknotes or coins, click the button below when you are done
RETURN_BONUSES_UP: RETURN BONUSES UP TO 30% COMPLETE PAYMENT
To_enter_the_system: To enter the system, enter the number phone or scan the QR code
To_credit_Bonuses_to_your_account: To credit Bonuses to your account, enter your phone number
By_clicking_on_CONFIRM: By clicking on CONFIRM, you give your consent to send SMS messages and personal data processing to you, according to the conditions posted on the website: www.alles-bonus.com
Failed_to_connect_to_the_bank_terminal: Failed to connect to the bank terminal
Follow_the_instructions_on_the_terminal: Follow the instructions on the terminal
You_want_to_complete_the_car_wash: You want to complete the car wash and return the balance with bonuses?
By_clicking_the_Yes_button_you_give_your: By clicking the Yes button, you consent to the sending of SMS messages to you and the processing of personal data in accordance with the conditions posted on the website: www.alles-bonus.com
